isis.stitle: CAB: 7000 AND 8000 SERIES MODELS - REMOVAL AND INSTALLATION - Headliner Trim Panel - Extended Cab

step1.para:
Remove header console panel. Refer to
HEADER CONSOLE PANEL
.

figure.caption: Figure 128. Headliner Trim Panel, Extended Cab, Front

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

note.para: Use the ZTSE4839 interior trim tool to remove all push-in interior fasteners.

step1.para: Remove two push-in fasteners at the top of each corner and side interior trim panel.
Remove five push-in fasteners from the back of the front headliner trim panel where both headliners join.
Remove one push-in fastener from front, center of the headliner trim panel. Support the front of the front headliner trim panel after removing push-in fastener.
Lower the front of the front headliner trim panel and slide forward.
Carefully pull the headliner trim panel out from underneath rear headliner trim panel and remove.
Slide back edge of front headliner trim panel in place over the top of the rear headliner trim panel ( Figure 128, Items 2 and 3).
Lift up the front, center of the front headliner trim panel and install one push-in fastener through trim panel and into cab header ( Figure 128, Items 1, 2, and 4).
Install five push-in fasteners into the back of the front headliner trim panel where both headliners join ( Figure 128, Items 2, 3, and 4).
Install two push-in fasteners into the top of each corner and side interior trim panel ( Figure 128, Items 4 and 5).

Install header console panel. Refer to
HEADER CONSOLE PANEL
.

figure.caption: Figure 129. Headliner Trim Panel, Extended Cab, Rear

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

item.para: Use the ZTSE4839 interior trim tool to remove all push-in interior fasteners.
Graphic shows passenger side; driver side procedures are the same.

step1.para: Pull coat hook lever cover down.
Push coat hook lever down and remove coat hook.
Remove four push-in fasteners at the top of each corner and side interior trim panel.
Remove two push-in fasteners at the back of rear headliner trim panel.

figure.caption: Figure 130. Headliner Trim Panel, Extended Cab, Rear

step1.para: Remove five push-in fasteners securing front headliner trim panel and rear headliner trim panel.
Slide front of rear headliner trim panel forward and carefully pull out from behind corner and side interior trim panels.
Lower rear headliner trim panel down and disconnect electrical connector from courtesy light.
Remove rear headliner trim panel.

note.para: Graphic shows passenger side; driver side procedures are the same.

step1.para: Connect electrical connector to courtesy light ( Figure 130, Items 3 and 4).
Slide rear headliner trim panel into place between corner and side interior trim panels ( Figure 129, Items 4 and 6).
Install five push-in fasteners through rear headliner trim panel and front headliner trim panel into the cab header ( Figure 130).
Install two push-in fasteners into the back of rear headliner trim panel ( Figure 129, Items 4 and 5).
Install four push-in fasteners into the top of each corner and side interior trim panel ( Figure 129, Items 5 and 6).
Install coat hook and press in until it snaps in place ( Figure 129, Item 1).
Push coat hook lever cover up and press until it snaps in place ( Figure 129, Item 2).
